entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Whitehorse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: SSE 31 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Drifting snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Occasional drifting snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
